text: Belchior (, born Antônio Carlos Gomes Belchior, October 26, 1946 - April 30, 2017), was a Brazilian singer and composer. He was one of the first MPB singers from the Brazilian northeast to reach mainstream success, in the early 1970s. He was born in Sobral, Ceará, Brazil. Belchior died on April 30, 2017 at a hospital in Santa Cruz do Sul, Brazil from multiple organ failure, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Ceará Category:Brazilian singers Category:Brazilian composers
title: Belchior (singer)
